content_sections.content:
Example Calculate the hypotenuse of different right-angle triangles: "; echo hypot(4,6) . "
"; echo hypot(1,3) . "
"; echo sqrt(3*3+4*4); ?> Definition and Usage The hypot() function calculates the hypotenuse of a right-angle triangle. Tip: This function is equivalent to sqrt(x*x + y*y). Syntax hypot( x,y ); Parameter Values Parameter Description x Required. Specifies the length of first side y Required. Specifies the length of second side Technical Details Return Value: The length of the hypotenuse Return Type: Float PHP Version: 4.1+ ★ +1
